article_title: Coronavirus | Resident doctor of Lucknow’s KGMU tests positive
article_description: King George Medical University announced suspension of all undergraduate academic classes and examinations till April 2 as a preventive measure to stem the spread of COVID 19
article_content: A 25 year old junior resident doctor of the King George Medical University  KGMU  in Lucknow has tested positive for coronavirus  COVID 19  after coming in contact with two patients undergoing treatment for the disease on its premises  a hospital spokesperson   2662 chars
